title: BONDIR R2 PRO Massage Gun - Articulating Deep Tissue Back Massager with Extension Handle and 7X Heads Including Heated Attachment
features: Relief + Recover: Quiet yet powerful percussion to help relax muscles and ease tension, increases mobility and range of motion, alleviate aches and pains for quick relief and recovery
Exclusive Handle Extension: Extra-long 6” extension handle with textured grip for extended reach and comfort
Adjustable Angle: Articulating arm lets you choose the idea position for increased reach, reduced fatigue, and to effortlessly target any part of your body

Heated Therapy: Includes an innovative heated massage head to help deep tissue and muscle relaxation and blood flow. Customize the temperature between 112ºF to 140ºF. *Heat therapy only activated when the metal Flat Head is attached

Professional Grade: 7 interchangeable attachment heads, extra-long battery life, multi-speed, Great for personal use as well as professional physical therapists, chiropractors, personal trainers, athletes. For use at home, the gym, on travel, and office. Includes carrying case for storage, travel, and portability. USB-A to USB-C charging cable included
description: Product Description R2 Pro Percussion Massager with Extension 90° articulating arm with 3 positions for better reach. 7 interchangeable attachments. Innovative heating head to help deep muscle relaxation. Unique 6" extension handle with textured grip. Powerful percussion. Multi-speed. Quiet technology. Up to 12 hours battery life. Relief & Recover Pro The all-inclusive portable percussive massager that offers powerful, yet quiet relief.
